description: A game in the Farming Simulator franchise, first released on PC on October 30, 2014. The game released on May 19, 2015 for Xbox 360, PS3, PS4, and Xbox One. The PS4 and Xbox One versions of the game feature the first online multiplayer on consoles. New to Farming Simulator 15 is the ability to transform the terrain with wood cutting tools and equipment.
name: Farming Simulator 15
